Do you know about blood rarefaction?

You see, blood is in some way the key to an incredible power. However, it is usually difficult to manifest it. But if you use moonstones to extract the hemoglobin from it, you create a vacuum inside it which breaks down the... um...

Are you getting any of this...?

name: Yu-Gi-Oh
description: If this is your first turn, set the health pool to 1 and gain one blood. At any point, if you have a

in your hand, you can search for this card and reveal it. Shuffle your deck. If this is not your first turn, this command enters the timeline with one Command counter per card on your opponent's hand. Also, add one Command counter whenever your opponent draws a card. If this card has 12 Command counters, you win the game. Any time one of your opponent's creatures attacks an empty space, they may choose to not do so instead. If they choose this, add one Attacked counter. If this card has 3 or more Attacked counters, Liberate it. You may remove up to 3 Command counters from this card to remove that amount of Attacked counters. If you play this card and your opponent has a
they can choose to play it simultaneously as you play this card.
abilities: If this is your first turn, set the health pool to 1 and gain one blood.
At any point, if you have a "Magic: The Gathering" in your hand, you can search for this card and reveal it.
Shuffle your deck.
If this is not your first turn, this command enters the timeline with one Command counter per card on your opponent's hand. Also, add one Command counter whenever your opponent draws a card.
If this card has 12 Command coutners, you win the game.
Any time one of your opponent's creatures attacks an empty space, they may choose to not do so instead. If they choose this, add one Attacked counter.
If this card has 3 or more Attacked counters, Liberate it.
You may remove up to 3 Command counters from this card to remove that amount of Attacked counters.
If you play this card and your opponent has a "Magic: The Gathering," they can choose to play it simultaneously as you play this card.
